name: Routes to GPX
description: Convert Google Maps direction URLs and KML files exported from Google My Maps to GPX format for GPS devices like Garmin, Wahoo, and cycling computers

skills.name: Convert Google Maps URL to GPX
skills.description: Extracts route coordinates from a Google Maps directions URL and converts to GPX format. Input: Google Maps URL (e.g., https://www.google.com/maps/dir/...). Output: GPX XML string.

skills.name: Convert KML to GPX
skills.description: Converts KML file content (exported from Google My Maps at google.com/maps/d) to GPX format. Input: KML XML string. Output: GPX XML string.

kml.description: KML file content as XML string
